publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.S. for George Norton, and are to be solde at his shoppe, vnder the Blacke-bell within Temple-barre,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The muses sacrifice, or, Diuine meditations.
Dedicatory verse signed: Iohn Dauies of Hereford.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
